Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core.IEnvManager

  • Packages that use IEnvManager 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core  
    org.eclipse.ptp.ems.ui  

    • Uses of IEnvManager in org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core

      Subinterfaces of IEnvManager in org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IEnvManager2
      Extension to IEnvManager providing a second implementation of IEnvManager2.determineAvailableElements(IProgressMonitor, List) that allows the list of selected modules to be passed to the method to determine available modules.
      Methods in org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core that return IEnvManager 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static IEnvManager EnvManagerRegistry.getEnvManager​(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor pm, org.eclipse.remote.core.IRemoteConnection remoteConnection)
      Detects the environment management system on the remote machine, if any, and returns an IEnvManager capable of interfacing with that system.
      static IEnvManager EnvManagerRegistry.getNullEnvManager()  

    • Uses of IEnvManager in org.eclipse.ptp.ems.ui

      Classes in org.eclipse.ptp.ems.ui that implement IEnvManager 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LazyEnvManagerDetector
      An implementation of IEnvManager which avoids connecting to the remote machine until it is actually necessary, then displays a progress dialog while the connection is established and subsequently forwards all method calls to the IEnvManager returned by EnvManagerRegistry.getEnvManager(IProgressMonitor, IRemoteConnection) .
